mcq.statement: Mark the correct sentence: As for my health, you needn't worry ,As concerning my health, you don't have to worry.

options.a: As for my health, you needn't worry
options.b: As concerning my health, you don't have to worry.
options.c: As goes my health, you cannot worry.
options.d: As far as my health is concerned, you don't have to worry
